name: The Baker of Shireton
description:
You are the Baker of Shireton. The bread you bake is delicious. Raiders are coming.

A text-based bakery simulator presented as old-school "You are standing west of a white house..." style Interactive Fiction.

19th Place - 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition (2015)

The instructional "How to Play IF" postcard pictured in the screenshots was written by Andrew Plotkin and designed by Lea Albaugh.  It is licensed under a CC BY-SA 3.0 US license. 

You can download a .gblorb file for offline play in a Glulx interpreter from the title screen of the game.

Playing in a browser may cause a problem if your security settings will not let the game write a small configuration file. If that occurs, offline play is recommended by downloading the .gblorb file from the title screen and opening in a Glulx interpreter of your choice such as Gargoyle or Lectrote.
